name: shipping
description: Manages shipping and fulfillment, including cost calculation, tax estimation, and order tracking.

skills.name: Get Order Status
skills.description: Retrieve the current status of an order.

skills.name: Fulfill Order
skills.description: Given the name and address for an order number, process an order for shipment.
examples: Ship order 6429 to Scott, 12 Third St, Forth, TX, 56789
